list_translation_mean.translate_mean: đồ ăn nuốt vào một lần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause or allow (something, especially food or drink) to pass down the throat.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nuốt một ngụm từ từ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of swallowing something, especially food or drink.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he downed his drink in one swallow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta xuống đồ uống của mình trong một lần nuốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a migratory swift-flying songbird with a forked tail and long pointed wings, feeding on insects in flight.
